title: Himi 220
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ke tau fa’a fakafeta’i,
Ki he ‘Eiki lelei,
‘O e Sāpate, pea tau
Fakataha foki.
2.
Mo e kakai monū’ia,
‘Oku fai ma’u ai pē;
‘I he hiva faimālie
‘A e mālōlō ma’u.
3.
‘Oku nau tauhi ma’u ai pē
Pea mālie ai,
‘A e Sāpate tonu,
‘I he maama lelei.
4.
Pea ‘i he’emau pehē,
Pea manatu’i,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona,
‘Oku mau tupu ai.
5.
Na’e hā ‘i he ‘Otua,
Ko e Folofola,
‘A e mana lahi taha,
‘I he ‘aho tapu.
6.
’Oku toetu’u, ‘a ia
Na’a ne fakatau;
‘A e kakai angahala,
‘I he ongosia.
7.
Ko e fakatupu, ‘a e
Maama na’e ‘ikai
‘Oku lahi, kae lahi
Hake, ke Huhu’i. *
